EmailTemplate.name: Background Check Order
EmailTemplate.subject: Background check needed for: {!Account.FirstName__c} {!Account.LastName__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello.
We need to run a background check for:
Name: {!Account.FirstName__c} {!Account.LastName__c}. Email: {!Account.Email__c}.
Once the background check is completed, please upload the results to the secured location of the user's account in Salesforce and notify info@atlasdog.org of the results.
Thanks! {!User.FirstName} {!User.LastName}
